td.content: s:patient presents with Mental Health. he is a 34 yr old white male. o:Height 64 in, Weight 134 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.
